item.title: Spinach Wraps
item.description: Chop the spinach into very small pieces. Mix the spinach with the rest of the ingredients. Heat a pan with a few drops of olive oil. Spoon a bit of the mixture onto the pan and shape it into a round form with the back of a spoon. Cook on both sides until golden brown. You can fill them with your favourite toppings (e.g., cucumber, arugula, smoked salmon, and light mayonnaise).
